entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 22.
entry.summary: Sunny early this afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud with periods of snow beginning this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 22. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 32 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 21.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light after midnight. Temperature steady near minus 21. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 28 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CST Friday 03 February 2023
